name: Dead Pixels (itch) (Zebulah)
description:
The Unfolding has begun and Evil seeps into the world through the Rift, the nexus of realities.

You are Somu, a lone adventurer fighting to refold the world.

Use the power of the *pixels of life* to release powerful attacks and vanquish you foes but beware. Some say that your attacks damage the pixels and further unfold the world.

1920 x 1080 Display Required
